SEARCH
Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result

Class AsyncAttempt<T,F extends FailureReason>

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result.AsyncAttempt<T,F>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the successful result.
F - The type representing failure reasons.
public final class AsyncAttempt<T,F extends FailureReason> extends Object
An asynchronous wrapper for the Attempt class.

This class represents an attempt to process a value asynchronously, where the operation can either succeed with a result of type T or fail with a reason of type F.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the successful result.
      F - The type representing failure reasons.
      Parameters:
      future - The future to wrap.
      completionHandler - A function that processes the result or exception and returns an Attempt.
      Returns:
      An instance of AsyncAttempt.

      Parameters:

      messageReplacements - Optional message replacements for localization.
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • map

      public <U> AsyncAttempt<U,F> map(Function<? super T,? extends U> mapper)
      Transforms the successful result of this AsyncAttempt into a new successful result using the provided mapper function. If the current attempt is a failure, the failure reason and message are propagated to the new attempt.
      Type Parameters:
      U - The type of the new result.
      Parameters:
      mapper - The function to transform the successful result into a new result.
      Returns:
      A new AsyncAttempt containing the transformed result.

    • mapAttempt

      public <U> AsyncAttempt<U,F> mapAttempt(Function<? super T,Attempt<U,F>> mapper)
      Transforms the result of this AsyncAttempt into a new attempt using the provided mapper function if it is successful.
      Type Parameters:
      U - The type of the result in the new attempt.
      Parameters:
      mapper - The function to transform the successful result into a new Attempt.
      Returns:
      A new AsyncAttempt containing the transformed result.

    • mapAsyncAttempt

      public <U> AsyncAttempt<U,F> mapAsyncAttempt(Function<? super T,AsyncAttempt<U,F>> mapper)
      Transforms the successful result of this AsyncAttempt into another asynchronous attempt. Note the function will not run on the main thread, so do not modify non thread-safe bukkit apis.
      Type Parameters:
      U - The type of the transformed result.
      Parameters:
      mapper - The function that maps the result into another AsyncAttempt.
      Returns:
      A new AsyncAttempt containing the transformed result.

      Returns:
